reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of COMM 390, COMM 395. (Fourth-year standing.)
COMM 390 and COMM 395 will be compulsory prerequisites for the 2017 Winter Session.
This course is restricted to BCom students in Year 4. Students who have completed COMM 486T 'Fundamentals of Entrepreneurship' cannot receive credit for COMM 497 (COMM 49X requirement in Year 4 must be met by taking one of COMM 491, COMM 492, or COMM 498).
Student may not receive credit for COMM 497 if they have taken COMM 466 or COMM 486Y.

Student may not receive credit for COMM 497 if they have taken COMM 466 or COMM 486Y.
description: The particular problems and experiences encountered in starting, developing and managing new enterprises. The course includes lectures, guest speakers, and case studies.
